name: The Inaccurate Machine
description:
This game was created for UE4 Epic Mega Jam 2018.

It is a tribute to Sierra Entertainment's The Incredible Machine. More than 25 years of Incredible Machines!

The tiles have been modernized strictly adhering to the original design. Everything was coded and created during the jam except the fonts (thanks to Kenney.NL and David Kerkhoff) and the particle effects (thanks to Tom Looman).
